amendment.description: Amendment, as modified, sought to give the President the flexibility to designate Morocco as eligible to participate in programs or receive assistance under the Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 6 in part II of House Rept. 105-431, as modified, to permit the President the discretion of allowing Morocco to participate in the programs of the bill if the President determines that the country meets the requirements in the bill and that the designation is deemed to be in the national interest of the United States.

action.text: Bereuter amendment (A006) modified by unanimous consent.
On agreeing to the Bereuter amendment (A006) as modified Failed by recorded vote: 156 - 258 (Roll No. 45).
